EmailTemplate.name: Victor Email 3.Victor Email 3
EmailTemplate.subject: Introduction Follow-Up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
It’s Victor here once again, your new account rep.
I’m looking forward to working with you. I see you didn’t respond to my previous emails, so I was wondering if there would be a better time to follow up with you this year?
Thanks,
Victor Cheung Inside Account Manager
We have the business solutions to help you operate in the new normal.
If you no longer wish to receive emails from Grand & Toy please click here <[[https://go.grandandtoy.com/Unsubscribe.html]]> to update your preferences.
200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L 9C7 E-mail: VictorCheung@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:VictorCheung@grandandtoy.com]]> | Tel: 416-401-6300 ext. 86406 | Web: grandandtoy.com <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/?cmp={{my.token}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> LinkedIn : https://www.linkedin.com/in/victor-cheung-23603878 <[[https://www.linkedin.com/in/victor-cheung-23603878]]>
Office Supplies | Interiors & Furniture | Print & Documents | Facility Resources | Technology CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The information contained in this email and attached document(s) may contain confidential information that is intended only for the addressee(s). If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby advised that any disclosure, copying, distribution or the taking of any action in reliance upon the information is prohibited. If you have received this email in error, please immediately notify the sender and delete it from your system.
